Text:
If they had put Gunstar Heroes and Wonderboy in Monster World in this it would pretty much had covered all the Genesis goodies - Amazing Collection. 
RGH though, guess it wont work with my xk3y then.

Well, guess I just had to try my xk3y on this since some ass on a forum said he had gotten DLC working on his xk3y. Maybe that´ll work. Guess I´ll give that a shot... When theres DLC out that´s actually worth the time.

Thanks for the upload anyways!
